title: Trump Impeachment, Dr. Deborah Birx
itunes:title: Trump Impeachment, Dr. Deborah Birx
description:
Guests: Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Iona College Professor, Bloomberg politics contributor and author of "American Democracy in Crisis," Lester Munson, Principal at government relations firm, BGR Group, and Dr. Deborah Birx, Coronavirus Response Coordinator at the U.S. State Department.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
